atk-abh03a32:2_1: Idāni atthi arahato puññūpacayotikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:2_2: Tattha yesaṁ arahato dānasaṁvibhāgacetiyavandanādīni kammāni disvā atthi arahato puññūpacayoti laddhi, seyyathāpi andhakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a32:2_3: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:2_4: Atha naṁ ‘‘arahā nāma pahīnapuññapāpo, so yadi puññaṁ kareyya,
atk-abh03a32:2_8: Dānaṁ dadeyyātiādīsu kiriyacittena dānādipavattisabbhāvato sakavādī paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:2_9: Itaro cittaṁ anādiyitvā kiriyāpavattimattadassaneneva laddhiṁ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a32:2_10: Sā pana ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhāpitā hotīti.
atk-abh03a32:5_1: Idāni natthi arahato akālamaccūtikathā nāma hoti. Tattha ‘‘nāhaṁ, bhikkhave,
atk-abh03a32:5_2: sañcetanikānaṁ kammānaṁ katānaṁ upacitānaṁ apaṭisaṁveditvā byantībhāvaṁ vadāmī’’ti (a. ni.
atk-abh03a32:5_3: 10.217) suttassa atthaṁ ayoniso gahetvā ‘‘arahatā nāma sabbakammavipākaṁ paṭisaṁvedayitvāva parinibbāyitabbaṁ, tasmā natthi,
atk-abh03a32:5_6: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:5_8: arahantaghātakena nāma na bhavitabba’’nti codetuṁ natthi arahantaghātakoti āha.
atk-abh03a32:5_9: Itaro ānantariyakammassa ceva tādisānañca puggalānaṁ sabbhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a32:6_0: 781.Visaṁ na kameyyāti pañhe ‘‘yāva pubbe katakammaṁ parikkhayaṁ na gacchati,
atk-abh03a32:7_0: 782.Nāhaṁ,bhikkhaveti suttaṁ idaṁ sandhāya vuttaṁ – sañcetanikānaṁ kammānaṁ katānaṁ vipākaṁ apaṭisaṁveditvā avinditvā ananubhavitvā byantībhāvaṁ tesaṁ kammānaṁ parivaṭumaparicchinnabhāvaṁ na vadāmi,
atk-abh03a32:7_1: tañca kho diṭṭhadhammavedanīyānaṁ diṭṭheva dhamme, na tato paraṁ,
atk-abh03a32:7_2: upapajjavedanīyānaṁ anantaraṁ upapattiṁ upapajjitvāva na tato paraṁ,
atk-abh03a32:7_5: Evaṁ sabbathāpi saṁsārapavatte sati laddhavipākavāre kamme na vijjateso jagatippadeso,
atk-abh03a32:7_7: Evaṁ sante yadetaṁ ‘‘aladdhavipākavārampi kammaṁ avassaṁ arahato paṭisaṁveditabba’’nti kappanāvasena ‘‘natthi arahato akālamaccū’’ti laddhipatiṭṭhāpanaṁ kataṁ, taṁ dukkaṭamevāti.
atk-abh03a32:10_2: Tattha ‘‘kammunā vattati loko’’ti suttaṁ nissāya ‘‘sabbamidaṁ kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṁ kammatova hotī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi ,
atk-abh03a32:10_4: te sandhāya sabbamidanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:10_5: Atha naṁ ‘‘evaṁ sante kammampi kammato āpajjatī’’ti codetuṁ kammampi kammatoti āha.
atk-abh03a32:10_6: Itaro yadi kammampi kammatova nāma taṁ kammaṁ vipākoyeva siyāti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a32:11_2: tampi purimatare bhave kammatoti kammavipāko sampajjati,
atk-abh03a32:11_3: tena te sabbamidaṁ kammavipākato āpajjatī’’ti codetuṁ pucchati.
atk-abh03a32:11_4: Itaro bījato aṁkurasseva paccuppannapavattassa kammato nibbattiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a32:11_5: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho tassāpi kammassa bījassa purimabījato viya purimakammato pavattattā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:11_8: Itaro dussīlyacetanāpi purimakammanibbattā ekena pariyāyena vipākoyevāti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:11_9: Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi te pāṇātipāto kammavipākato nibbattati,
atk-abh03a32:11_10: pāṇātipāto viya vipākopi saphalo āpajjatī’’ti codetuṁ saphaloti āha.
atk-abh03a32:11_11: Itaro pāṇātipātassa nirayasaṁvattanikādibhāvato saphalataṁ passanto paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:11_12: Kammavipākassa pana idaṁ nāma phalanti vuttaṭṭhānaṁ apassanto paṭikkhipati. Adinnādānādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-abh03a32:11_14: Kammunā vattatīti suttaṁ ‘‘natthi kamma’’nti akammavāditaṁ paṭikkhipitvā ‘‘atthi kamma’’nti kammavāditaṁ kammassakataṁ dīpeti.
atk-abh03a32:11_15: Na sabbasseva kammato nibbattiṁ, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a32:14_4: anindriyabaddhaṁ udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena ‘‘yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha’’nti saṅgahitattā dukkhaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:14_5: Imaṁ vibhāgaṁ aggahetvā ‘‘yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati,
atk-abh03a32:14_6: taṁ indriyabaddhameva dukkhaṁ, na itara’’nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṁ,
atk-abh03a32:14_7: tesaṁ itarassāpi dukkhabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ indriyabaddhaññevāti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:14_8: Atha naṁ ‘‘yasmā bhagavatā ‘yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha’nti vuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a32:14_9: tasmā indriyabaddheneva tena aniccena bhavitabba’’nti codetuṁ indriyabaddhaññeva aniccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a32:14_10: Nanuanindriyabaddhaṁ aniccanti nanu pathavīpabbatapāsāṇādi anindriyabaddhampi aniccanti attho.
atk-abh03a32:15_0: 788.Na vattabbaṁ indriyabaddhaññeva dukkhanti pañhe āmantāti paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a32:15_2: Uṇhakālasmiñhi aggi sītakāle ca vāto dukkhassa ārammaṇaṁ,
atk-abh03a32:15_4: Tasmā vināpi aniccaṭṭhena anindriyabaddhaṁ dukkhanti vattabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:15_5: Kammakilesehi pana anibbattattā dukkhaṁ ariyasaccanti na vattabbaṁ, tathā maggena apariññeyyattā.
atk-abh03a32:15_6: Yasmā pana tiṇakaṭṭhādinirodho vā utubījādinirodho vā dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh03a32:15_8: itaraṁ pana dukkhamevāti idaṁ nānattaṁ dassetuṁ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:15_9: Yathā indriyabaddhassātiādivacanaṁ indriyabaddhassa pariññāya brahmacariyavāsaṁ pariññātassa puna anuppattiṁ dīpeti.
atk-abh03a32:15_11: ‘‘Yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha’’nti vacanena pana saṅgahitassa anindriyabaddhassa dukkhabhāvaṁ paṭisedhetuṁ na sakkāti, tasmā asādhakanti.
atk-abh03a32:18_3: tasmā ṭhapetvā ariyamaggaṁ avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi hetuvādānaṁ;
atk-abh03a32:18_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:18_5: Atha naṁ ‘‘yadi evaṁ samudayassāpi dukkhabhāvo āpajjatī’’ti codetuṁ dukkhasamudayopīti āha.
atk-abh03a32:18_8: Tīṇevāti pañhesu suttavirodhabhayena paṭikkhipati, laddhivasena paṭijānāti. Sesamettha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-abh03a32:21_1: Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ paṭiggaṇhātītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:21_5: tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ paṭiggaṇhātī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a32:21_7: te sandhāya na vattabbanti pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:21_9: na naṁ satthā āhuneyyātiādīhi thomeyyā’’ti codetuṁ nanu saṅgho āhuneyyotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a32:21_10: Saṅghassa dānaṁ dentīti ‘‘ye te saṅghassa denti,
atk-abh03a32:21_11: te paṭiggāhakesu asati kassa dadeyyu’’nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:21_12: Āhutiṁ jātavedo vāti suttaṁ parasamayato āgataṁ.
atk-abh03a32:21_15: Maggo paṭiggaṇhātīti ‘‘maggaphalāni saṅgho’’ti laddhiyā vadati, na ca maggaphalāneva saṅgho.
atk-abh03a32:21_16: Maggaphalapātubhāvaparisuddhe pana khandhe upādāya paññattā aṭṭha puggalā saṅgho, tasmā asādhakametanti.
atk-abh03a32:24_1: Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:24_3: na ca tāni dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetuṁ sakkonti,
atk-abh03a32:24_4: tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaññeva;
atk-abh03a32:24_5: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:24_6: Āhuneyyotiādi ‘‘yadi saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-abh03a32:24_7: na naṁ satthā evaṁ thomeyyā’’ti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:24_9: Saṅghasmiñhi appaṁ dinnaṁ bahu hoti, bahu dinnaṁ bahutaraṁ.
atk-abh03a32:24_13: appamattikāyapi dakkhiṇāya mahantaṁ phalaṁ pāpuṇantīti attho. Sesaṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayamevāti.
atk-abh03a32:27_1: Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅgho bhuñjatītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:27_2: Tatrāpi ‘‘maggaphalāneva saṅgho nāma, na ca tāni kiñci bhuñjanti,
atk-abh03a32:27_3: tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅgho bhuñjati, pivati, khādati, sāyatī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaṁyeva;
atk-abh03a32:27_4: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:27_6: saṅghabhattādikaraṇaṁ niratthakaṁ bhaveyyā’’ti codetuṁ nanu atthi keci saṅghabhattāni karontītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a32:27_9: Aṭṭha pānānīti idampi ‘‘yadi saṅgho na piveyya,
atk-abh03a32:27_10: kassetāni pānāni satthā anujāneyyā’’ti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:30_1: Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅghassa dinnaṁ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:30_3: na ca sakkā tesaṁ kiñci dātuṁ, na ca tehi paṭiggaṇhituṁ,
atk-abh03a32:30_4: nāpi tesaṁ dānena koci upakāro ijjhati,
atk-abh03a32:30_5: tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅghassa dinnaṁ mahapphala’’nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaṁyeva;
atk-abh03a32:30_6: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:30_7: Āhuneyyotiādi ‘‘yadi saṅghassa dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ na bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a32:30_8: na naṁ satthā evaṁ thomeyyā’’ti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:33_1: Idāni na vattabbaṁ buddhassa dinnaṁ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:33_3: lokānuvattanatthaṁ pana paribhuñjamānaṁ viya attānaṁ dasseti,
atk-abh03a32:33_4: tasmā nirupakārattā na vattabbaṁ tasmiṁ dinnaṁ mahapphala’’nti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi tesaṁyeva;
atk-abh03a32:33_5: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:33_7: kimaṅgaṁ pana evarūpe aggapuggale’’ti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:36_2: Tattha ‘‘yadi paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇā visujjheyya, mahapphalā bhaveyya. Dāyakena dānaṁ dinnaṁ,
atk-abh03a32:36_3: paṭiggāhakena vipāko nibbattitoti añño aññassa kārako bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a32:36_4: paraṁkataṁ sukhadukkhaṁ āpajjeyya, añño kareyya, añño paṭisaṁvedeyya.
atk-abh03a32:36_5: Tasmā dāyakatova dānaṁ visujjhati, no paṭiggāhakato,
atk-abh03a32:36_6: dāyakasseva cittavisuddhi vipākadāyikā hotī’’ti yesaṁ laddhi, seyyathāpi uttarāpathakānaṁ;
atk-abh03a32:36_7: te sandhāya pucchā sakavādissa, paṭiññā itarassa.
atk-abh03a32:36_10: Añño aññassa kārakoti yadi dāyakassa dānacetanā paṭiggāhakena katā bhaveyya, yuttarūpaṁ siyā.
atk-abh03a32:36_11: Tassa pana dānacetanā parisuddhā paṭiggāhakasaṅkhātaṁ vatthuṁ paṭicca mahāvipākaṭṭhena visujjhati,
